metadata.dc:author: Navazo Eguía, Ana Isabel
Terán Santos, Joaquin
Huelga Ruíz, Miguel Angel
Ruíz de la Parte, Ana
metadata.dc:description: Liposarcomas rarely occur in the head and neck. We report a case of myxoid liposarcoma occurring in the retropharyngeal space in a middle-aged male with clinical symptoms of obstructive sleep apnoea.
metadata.dc:title: Liposarcoma retrofaríngeo: a propósito de un caso de apneas-hipopneas durante el sueño.
[Retropharyngeal liposarcoma: apropos of a case of apnoeas and hypopnoea during sleep].
